function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for new forms of risk in gated communities related to urban design and socio-spatial configurations.","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to new forms of risk and potential danger to residents.","Mitigation":"Careful urban design and community planning to reduce susceptibility to new forms of risk.","Technologies":"Urban planning and architectural design focused on safety and risk mitigation.","People":"Residents of gated communities, urban planners, architects, and policymakers.","Owner":"Urban planning authorities and community developers."},{"Description":"Social segregation and lack of contact with other social groups in gated communities.","Impact":"Reduced interaction with the rest of society, exacerbation of social inequality.","Mitigation":"Promotion of social integration programs and policies, encouragement of community outreach and interaction.","Technologies":"Community engagement programs, social integration strategies, and policy initiatives.","People":"Residents of gated communities, community organizations, policymakers, and social advocates.","Owner":"Community developers, policymakers, and community organizations."},{"Description":"Inequality, lack of mobility freedom, parking restrictions, and higher housing unit prices in gated communities.","Impact":"Exacerbation of urban inequality, reduced mobility and accessibility, economic disparity.","Mitigation":"Equitable urban planning, affordable housing initiatives, and improved mobility infrastructure.","Technologies":"Smart city technologies, urban planning software, and affordable housing programs.","People":"Residents of gated communities, urban planners, policymakers, and advocacy groups.","Owner":"City government, urban planning authorities, and housing development organizations."}]}
